title: Daily reminder laners: You're not entitled to every kill
body:
When I gank yo shit
and get a kill, despite being a tank with zero AD
and just leave, das right.. no taxing
dont go hating on me, be happy I got yo mtherfknig laner outa way, glorious free farming, AND an assist
or would you have preferred no ganks, no assists, and duking it out with the other guy 
idgaf if you're the ad carry
you get what you can, I'm not gonna just stop autoattacking and place my trust in some making sure this man doesnt get out alive

replies.body: K then. I'll just help myself to your jg farm. Sure you won't mind.

Tbh, if a jungler successfully ganked a lane and actually killed the laner he has every right to tax the lane, even if the kill goes to him, he would just need to tax less instead of you taxing on his jungle, that imo isn't right.

Take my farm, and I'll take your farm. What's not right about it? 

 If I am not already winning lane, most of the time the gank is just going to fail anyway. Most successful ganks in Bronze 5 are only possible because I'm winning lane, and honestly taking the kill is just stealing my farm. If you had never come, I still would've killed them in the next ~3 minutes. If you play in a League where junglers actually HELP you, maybe that'd make sense (but still not really, I need it to scale).

If he hadn't ganked the farm is probably no even there, so with his help you got something out of it.

If you got the kill, he can farm your lane since you know he has to waste his farming time to come up to your lane and maybe wait there for a while so he has the right to kill a wave or so. 

If he scores the kill then maybe he doesn't take a wave but killing 1 or 2 is still completely acceptable.

Why are you so sure that you WILL get the kill? 
Why are you so sure the enemy jungler isn't near by? 
Why won't you want advantages quicker? 
why won't you want the other advantages killing the opposite laner grants? 
Why won't you want to get the team more gold from kill and assist instead of just a kill?

I don't understand your logic here.

My logic is simple. I don't want the jungler in my lane. The jungler won't come at the right time, and he'll probably feed. I'd rather keep what control over my lane I have and do my best to catch up to/destroy the enemy laner. 

So when this jungle thinks to himself, "You know what? I haven't ganked bot in a while, I'll walk down there", it's a problem. It's a direct threat to the success of my lane and myself. If you come to my lane, kill my laner, take my farm, and leave, what did I gain? Basically nothing, and you just made me a target for ganks.  And that is the very best case scenario.  If anyone dies to them, you just set me back a shit ton. 

In an ideal world, you just would stay the fuck out of my lane when I don't want you there. But you won't. You'll come and take my farm and kills, so I'm going to do the same to you and your buffs.

You are playing in the game with a genre that is fundamentally not your thing.

You're better off with games like say Dark Souls or idk, CoD(?) where it's just you and you alone, all the problem is because of you and all the glory belongs to you.

Teamwork scales better in this game, if you don't give 2 shiet about it then LoL really isn't for you.

Also a life advise from a novice like me, you're not the world's rotational axis. When you play games while thinking like that, I am kinda worried.

Bronze 5 is a lot more like CoD than you'd think. Or so Trick2g tells me, I've never actually played the game. I've never had consoles. But yeah, a lot of that is the ADC main part. The pentas get to your head.

> [{quoted}](name=The AFK Farmer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QEpv9Azf,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-28T09:38:38.181+0000)
>
> Bronze 5 is a lot more like CoD than you'd think. Or so Trick2g tells me, I've never actually played the game. I've never had consoles. But yeah, a lot of that is the ADC main part. The pentas get to your head.

Hey it's the jungle hater I see in 99% of jungle threads :)

"waste his farming time" You just got 300g worth of farm from the kill, the 1 minute it took you to wait, gank, walk to safety, back, and go back to farming puts you AHEAD in terms of time spent vs farm.
That's why if the jungler scores the kill he prob shouldn't be taxing minions, otherwise if he has the assist instead he should tax a few to compensate.
No problem with that, I thought you were saying he has the right to tax even if he gets the kill.

If you don't pay yo taxes, you don't get yo ganks.

So tell me, what are you taxing the jungler for? You didn't even leash and when the enemy jungler invaded, chased your jungler down and killed him you didn't even move from lane because you didn't want to miss any CS.

Don't bother denying it. I know your type.

I'm not waiting for you, I'm not helping you invade, I'm not helping you if they invade, but I'll leash if you're there when your camp spawns.

Your performance is your problem. My performance is my problem.
Man, you're a terrible player. I'm glad you'll never be on my team.
The whole "in Bronze 5" thing may have clued you into that.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QEpv9Azf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-28T08:42:42.325+0000)
>
> Tbh, if a jungler successfully ganked a lane and actually killed the laner he has every right to tax the lane

Why? You just got ~300 gold, why do you need the creeps too? If you got an assist I'd get it... But a kill? Really? Unless I'm super fed and he was only worth 80 gold you got plenty of gold from that.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QEpv9Azf,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-03-28T10:01:22.269+0000)
>
> That's why if the jungler scores the kill he prob shouldn't be taxing minions, otherwise if he has the assist instead he should tax a few to compensate.
OMG I GOT FREE GOLD, FREE EXP, FREE FARM, FREE TOWER PUSH AND YOU KSED ME AFTER I PINGED 10 TIMES FOR A GANK. NOOB JG.
No, but it might benefit your team if you're legendary and the laner is obviously going for the last hit, even if you did most of the work.

wrong. Lets say I'm going legendary as Master Yi or Fizz. Getting the kill means I get a fast devourer + bilgewater, not getting it means I'm stuck with vamp scepter. If I got bilge, I can snowball ALL lanes harder AND farm myself better due to superior damage and sustain, if I only have a vamp scepter, I have only smite as a CC and can't stick to people as well, have weaker sustain and weaker ganks, which means losing lane, losing farm and losing the game.
Great! Now that you have your bilgewater, the NEXT time you can give the kill to your laner, right?

nope, Yi and Fizz hit their next big power spike at BoRK, and then at BF sword/Giant's belt.

Delaying any of these power spikes may result in losing the game, since carry junglers work best when the enemy is behind and they can just walk up to them and 3 shot them.

Unlike laners, junglers don't have their gold literally walk right up to them for free. Junglers bleed and sweat for every penny. Even worse when you are playing a carry jungler and the laner scum saves nukes for last hitting instead of ensuring the success of the gank, just to deny you a Triforce/BoRK power spike.
i have caused my team to win several games while have 0 kills and getting all assist. both as fizz and yi. your full of shit.

lol and so you post on an unranked smurf thats 0-3 for what?

I'm full of shit? Really? lol k. I'm not the one whining about KS am I? If the laner gets the kill, aight. If I get the kill, aight. If the laner starts whining about KS, not aight.
person you replied to didnt whine about ks. it says very clearly that it would help the team. that isnt what ia m talkin about. just what you said doesnt make since

I hate it when people whine about KS, it's kind of annoying.
Ok, so when I'm Bard/Zilean/Teemo/Sona, I can kind of stop myself from attacking them, but when the Meeps/Beams/Poison/Bombs do the final tick of damage, I didn't deliberately mean to get the kill for myself, I was just trying to make sure they didn't get away.
I would rather get assists than kills, because the assists show that I was at least helping out my team in most of the fights. Plus, when I'm a tank, getting kills is shiny and stuff, but I'm gonna be building health anyway, not damage. I'm just meant to add utility to start the fight and make it easier for everyone else.

> [{quoted}](name=BluePolarizer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QEpv9Azf,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-28T09:39:20.490+0000)
>
> nope, Yi and Fizz hit their next big power spike at BoRK, and then at BF sword/Giant's belt.
> 
> Delaying any of these power spikes may result in losing the game, since carry junglers work best when the enemy is behind and they can just walk up to them and 3 shot them.
> 
> Unlike laners, junglers don't have their gold literally walk right up to them for free. Junglers bleed and sweat for every penny. Even worse when you are playing a carry jungler and the laner scum saves nukes for last hitting instead of ensuring the success of the gank, just to deny you a Triforce/BoRK power spike.

OK, so basically what you're saying is that as a jungler, the lanes exists to service YOU, right? That the only reason you have to gank is to add kills to your score and any laner who gets a kill on THEIR lane opponent instead of giving it to you is a noob?

You're every bit as bad as the laners who cry "KS!" Actually, you're worse; you're going into the game with the mindset that "every kill is MINE!" and the rest of your team are only here for your benefit.

Difference is, I don't go around saying "OMG KS". When the laner gets the kill, I say "gj", kill 1-2 minions and leave unless we are pushing. I don't whine for ganks 3 minutes into the game, I don't cry about being outplayed being other ppls fault and I sure as hell don't blame others for not warding or not securing objectives.

you say if u got the kill you could snowball all lanes harder...
but if you didnt steal the kill from the laner, wouldnt they already be snowballing?
therefore leaving you with only 2 lanes to snowball lol.

idk about you, but id rather have a snowballing mid laner and me with a vamp scept than all 3 lanes needing help and me with a devourer + bilge-water....
most mids don't scale as hard as Yi, Fizz or Hec. I'm the hard carry, if anything, I should be accusing THEM of kill stealing.

The idea is, a fed laner at most can snowball 1 to 2 lanes max, unless extremely so.

A fed jg'er on the other hand, can snowball all 3 lanes if played right.

While a lot of jungle champs lack scaling potential hence giving kills away is reasonable, but when a jungler is those that scales I wouldn't think hugging all the kills in lane because you wanna scale is the better idea here.

Also jungler has the right to tax every time he ganked successfully with a kill or at least waste him low and burnt the enemy's summoners.

You completely ignored what I said, which was "If you're legendary," which means you've been hugging all of the kills, not the laner, it might benefit the team as a whole if you gave away a kill to a laner who wasn't particularly struggling. I JUST played a game where I was 1/0, my mid was 5/1 from roaming, and the fed Annie supp made the same argument you did, and it was completely beyond the point. She had 9 kills, that's a lot of gold.. She's already up by an insane amount. Having your other lanes also up wouldn't have been harmful in any way.

Also, no one "has the right" to ANYTHING. If you EVER tax a lane, and then later bitch at the laner you taxed for being weaker than their opponent, you COULD BE completely responsible. If you tax your mid lane and then turn around and immediately bitch at your top for "stealing your jungle," you're just being a hypocrite.

I actually thought legendary was simply a metaphor instead of actually being legendary as in, kill streaks.

Dunno why I thought that way, I was too warped into the thought the game was in early phases for some reason.

If you're already hugging a shiet ton of gold and experience, then yes, if possible, give it away. Unless in enemy team there is someone who is just as fed as the legendary jungler, then in this case I think you should let him have the kill instead in order to compete that fella.

Otherwise, yes, you're correct imo. MB.

No worries, sorry if I came off as rude.

Anyway, I understand not giving away the kill to the 0/9 adc.. They're not really contributing.

League is a team oriented game, there is no such thing as a ks in a team, and no matter who gets the kill, it stills gives benefits of gold, experience and denying the enemy gold , farm and experience so this thread is pretty useless
you would surprised how salty people get, thinking junglers are the supports or some shit

As soon as a player accuses me of "KS" I mute him and carry on playing.

It's either that, or it's his last gank. And he certainly shouldn't come to me with cap in hand looking for my blue buff or red buff, because I have Smite and he don't.
personally i just have problem with junglers taking the kill, when i blow everything on it (flash, Ult, Ignite)

I upset adc's as a support sometimes because I get kills.  I just want to make sure the opponent dies.  I don't mean to always take the kill, I just want them to die and my adc to take as little damage as possible.  Same goes for from any position coming to help out.  Won't take the farm, just want to get they out of the way to push the lane.

While your attitude is somewhat questionable to me, but I will say I agree the idea behind it completely.

It's not like everybody is in pro scene where each kill and who it goes to actually matters, if you can get enemy laner dead which gives you gold, exp, free farm and potential free turrets and overall objective advantages I can't see missing a kill or 2 is something you should hate on. That's just stupid.

{{champion:55}} 

I COMPLETELY agree!
Dw we get our tax refund =)

Idc if you get the kill if you dont die,

but if you get the kill and either I or you die
that sets me behind because the enemy laner has the extra gold and I dont
which also hurts you because youll have to gank my lane more

I don't mind when junglers take kills.
But when they take a kill my ignite was going to secure, or they steal first blood, or against an enemy with a lead, then I get fucking pissed.
Not every kill, just the ones where I ignite a guy with ten health
I am fine with whoever getting kills as long as they didn't blow flash/ult to get it when someone else could have clearly gotten the kill without it.
If I gank your lane and it is time to take an objective. I am probably going to take CS, not because I want the gold but because I don't want you wasting time when we have shit to do.

Most junglers I've played with try very hard to give the laner the kill and even apologise if they take it. I don't actually care but they are generally very nice and conscious about it. 

Basically I never played with an Amumu or Sejuani that didn't try to give me the kill anyway. Just common sense.
